Diving & Underwater Photography Trip

The sea is calling you

Book now

We take you in a unique

Diving trip

Start in the beach

The adventure starts at Puerto Escondido beach, where your instructors will tell you about the Cuban marine ecosystem and the most abundant species that you will see

Explore the coral reef world

Once you dive into the sea you will discover the beautiful, unique, hidden coral reef world and your instructors will guide you to make you see the most of it

Underwater photography

The instructors will have high-resolution underwater cameras that will capture every detail of your experience to make this moment memorable to you

Jump into the sea
Explore a whole new world
Discover its wonders
Live a unique experience
Book now

Meet your instructors

Christian

Marine Biologist from the University of Havana who is diving since he was 14 years old. He is a professional diver certified by SNSI and NDL. He has a great passion for underwater photography and will share it with you ensuring not only you have a unique experience but also making your diving trip memorable

Anthony

Marine Biologist from the University of Havana who is diving since he was 14 years old. He is a professional diver certified by SNSI and NDL. He has a great passion for underwater photography and will share it with you ensuring not only you have a unique experience but also making your diving trip memorable
